
public class BookService {
	
	Integer getTickets(BookDetailsBean bookingDetails) {
		
		BookValidator BookingValidator=new BookValidator();
		
		try {
			BookingValidator.isValidEmail(bookingDetails.getEmail());
			BookingValidator.isValidName(bookingDetails.getName());
			BookingValidator.isValidTicket(bookingDetails.getNoOfTickets());
			UserInterface.bookingList.add(bookingDetails);
			bookingDetails.setBookingID(UserInterface.bookingList.size());
			
		}catch (Exception e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
			return 0;
		}
		return bookingDetails.getBookingID() ;
		
	}

}
